message: When they all have cracked skulls and broken bones, they can be pretty sure the mass grave was the result of a massacre.

If the subject is not covered by national news, if the story can't be confirmed by a simple google search with 2 other major, well known, credible newspapers covering it, it's likely to be fake news. Don't believe it.
